name: 洪輝嵩
objective:
此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.
schedule:
1.紡織產業介紹：第1-3週
2.纖維材料加工(含結晶、順向、延伸及張力)：第4-8週
3.抽絲及加工絲工程：第9-12週
4.織布及染整：第13-15週
5.期末報告：第16-18週
materials:
紡織產業工程入門-林清安教授編撰
纖維物理(第三版)-紡織綜合研究所
Dynamic Mechanical Analysis of polyester Material
